COption.Text: Why are you in front of Poron's place?
May I have one of your snacks?
Do you know Mr Poron's password?
He probably drank too much of your ale last night.
Did you try to wake him?
I haven't managed to get it yet.
I will be back once I have the Spirit of Hartshorn.
Do you have anything other than pennies?
Do you know Mr Poron's password?
How do you know something evil is here?
If you can hear everything, do you know Poron's password?
It's Fadi, Auntie Sylvia sent me.
Why did you just appear out of nowhere?
I wished that I could use this flag as a dress for the statue.
I'll be going for now, Mr Imp.
